title: Consent and proxies of partners
context: [ยง425E-118] Consent and proxies of partners.**** Action requiring the consent of partners under this chapter may be taken without a meeting, and a partner may appoint a proxy to consent or otherwise act for the partner by signing an appointment record, either personally or by the partner&rsquo;s attorney in fact. [L 2003, c 210, pt of ยง1]
